   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to surrender20's documentation!
==============================================

:program:`surrender20` is a Python package to predict the winning team of any ongoing game of League of Legends. It uses the Riot Games' API to gather the team compositions from all games on the current game patch and the Champion.gg API to get overall champion statistics on the current game patch.


Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   getting_started
   clean_training_data
   train_model
   get_game
   clean_input_data
   predict_response
